sec.p: The vector IgME1, used for ZFN-mediated targeted replacement, comprised a 0.758 kb homologous arm extending upstream of IgM exon 1 on the 5′ side, and a 1.035 kb arm extending downstream of IgM exon 1 to the end of exon 3 on the 3′ side, separated by a PGK neo polyA cassette (see Figure 3 and Figure S2). Homologous sequences were obtained by PCR from genomic DNA from a ZIKA rabbit.
